name: Haiti Kitty
description:
Press the space button and the arrow keys to help 3 feisty felines deal with pesky fish!

Try to get the purrfect 5 Star Rating!

Instructions Catfishing

Press Right to reel in your favourite fish!

Bassball

Press Up and Down to aim the purrfect strike!

Press Space when the fish hits the crosshair (it turns red) and then Space again to swing your bat, cat! Try to hit the fish with maximum kitty power!

Kittenchen

Press Up and Down to fillet your catch!

Press Right to handle meat and pan!

When your meat is done, press Space once more to receive your rating!

Can you get the elusive Haitian 5 Star Fish Cuisine Certificate?
